name: Flexible Hold Hairspray - Extra Strong Hold & Humidity Resistant
description: StyleMasterâ€™s Flexible Hold Hairspray offers extra strong hold and superior humidity resistance for all-day styling. This hairspray is designed to provide a flexible, long-lasting hold without leaving your hair feeling stiff or sticky. Its lightweight formula helps to maintain your style while protecting against frizz and flyaways caused by humidity. Ideal for all hair types and styles, this hairspray ensures your look stays perfect from morning to night.

name: Volumizing Mousse - Extra Volume & Shine for Fine Hair
description: VoluBoost Volumizing Mousse is perfect for adding extra volume and shine to fine hair. This mousse creates a full, voluminous look without weighing hair down. Infused with nourishing ingredients, it enhances your hair's natural shine and texture while providing long-lasting hold. Suitable for daily use, it works well for creating both everyday styles and special occasion looks. Give your hair the lift and shine it deserves with this professional-quality mousse.
